metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: With the HTML DOM, JavaScript can access and change all the elements of an HTML document.
content.html: With the HTML DOM, JavaScript can access and change all the elements of an HTML document.

content.text: When a web page is loaded, the browser creates a D ocument O bject M odel of the page.
content.html: When a web page is loaded, the browser creates a Document Object Model of the page.

content.text: The HTML DOM model is constructed as a tree of Objects :
content.html: The HTML DOM model is constructed as a tree of Objects:

content.text: With the object model, JavaScript gets all the power it needs to create dynamic HTML:
content.html: With the object model, JavaScript gets all the power it needs to create dynamic HTML:

content.text: In the next chapters of this tutorial you will learn:
content.html: In the next chapters of this tutorial you will learn:

content.text: The DOM is a W3C (World Wide Web Consortium) standard.
content.html: The DOM is a W3C (World Wide Web Consortium) standard.

content.text: The DOM defines a standard for accessing documents:
content.html: The DOM defines a standard for accessing documents:

content.text: "The W3C Document Object Model (DOM) is a platform and language-neutral interface that allows programs and scripts to dynamically access and update the content, structure, and style of a document."
content.html: "The W3C Document Object Model (DOM) is a platform and language-neutral interface that allows programs and scripts to dynamically access and update the content, structure, and style of a document."

content.text: The W3C DOM standard is separated into 3 different parts:
content.html: The W3C DOM standard is separated into 3 different parts:

content.text: The HTML DOM is a standard object model and programming interface for HTML. It defines:
content.html: The HTML DOM is a standard object model and programming interface for HTML. It defines:

content.text: In other words: The HTML DOM is a standard for how to get, change, add, or delete HTML elements.
content.html: In other words: The HTML DOM is a standard for how to get, change, add, or delete HTML elements.
